english.segment1: Take not Your Spirit from me. Lord lead me to Your peace. For my one desire is to be with You. Come cleanse my life and make me pure. Won't you wrap me up in Your arms and
english.segment2: CHORUS. Take me higher and draw me closer. And pull me deeper than I've ever been
english.segment3: Hide not Your face from me. Lord set my spirit free. For my one desire is to be with You. Come cleanse my life and make me pure. Won't You wrap me up in Your arms and
english.segment5: BRIDGE. Take me higher. Won't You draw me closer. Take me higher than I've ever been. Next to You is where I wanna be. Take me higher than I've ever been. Take not your Spirit from me. Take me. Take me higher than I've ever been before
